item.description:
Dear Members,

Our next meet is January 16th, 1-4pm. Actually, this is our &th year Anniversary Meet! So please come and help us celebrate!

Also, our subscription is about to expire at Meetup.com because I don't have a credit card to give them. I will probably find another way to renew, but just in case I don't, plese send me your DIRECT email address (and phone number too if you want) so that I can send you invitations to our future Mass. Small Dog Meets.

Below are my email addresses and my phone numbers.

robinberry519@gmail.com
laptopmaltese@aol.com

508 561 6881
508 380 6829

Small dog best and Happy Holidays!
Kim

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group
